reviewText: Revealing and educational. Also see Frontline: The Untouchables and Frontline: Retirement Gamble, all are essential to understanding what happened and what might happen to your investments. An entertaining companion to these is The Big Short

I really enjoyed learning about where it all started several years before, what helped become this giant snowball and how close we all came to a major world economic meltdown and the actions that were taken to avoid it. I highly recommend this clear and factual historical account.

If you don't know about the corruption on Wall Street these 5 Front Line broadcasts will get you started.  But these documentaries are only the tip of the iceberg.  Also get these and watch so you can be informed:  Inside Job / Plunder /  Inequality for All.

See my review of Robert Reich's Inequality For All. All the safeguards established in the US after the Great Depression of the 1920s were allowed to lapse. Now the rich and giant corporations own all our politicians of both parties, thanks to actions taken by our right wing supreme court and Reagan's reduction of taxes for the rich. Robert Reich makes it clear that the economy depends on spending by the middle class, not on the rich who own everything they need. Our current economic system borders on slavery. We are building new camps and prisons for the poor and minorities, who would spend money to keep the economy growing if they were allowed to fill jobs paying living wages.
